what: An R Wrapper for the Dutch Chamber of Commerce API
title: An R Wrapper for the Dutch Chamber of Commerce API
text: goal kvkapiR provides convenient interface Dutch Chamber Commerce (KvK) API. package built using httr2 package follows best practices wrapping APIs R, outlined httr2 documentation (https://httr2.r-lib.org/articles/wrapping-apis.html). simplifies authentication, request handling, response parsing interacting KvK API.

title: An R Wrapper for the Dutch Chamber of Commerce API
text: can install development version kvkapiR GitHub :

title: An R Wrapper for the Dutch Chamber of Commerce API
text: basic example shows use kvk_search() function:
code: library(kvkapiR)  koudum <- kvk_search(plaats = "Koudum") koudum #> # A tibble: 515 × 6 #>    kvkNummer vestigingsnummer naam                     adres        type  links  #>    <chr>     <chr>            <chr>                    <list>       <chr> <list> #>  1 01036576  000007810083     Stichting Gemeenschapsc… <named list> neve… <list> #>  2 60112891  000045511098     Corriente 't Kofjehúske  <named list> neve… <list> #>  3 92692966  000032358083     M. de Boer               <named list> neve… <list> #>  4 40005051  000021251479     Bogerman                 <named list> neve… <list> #>  5 30168016  000057781184     It Fûgelnêst             <named list> neve… <list> #>  6 58496505  000027833429     HFK Verhuur              <named list> hoof… <list> #>  7 62724843  000031708129     De Klink Exploitatie B.… <named list> hoof… <list> #>  8 01123666  000040288196     Winterberging IJzendoorn <named list> hoof… <list> #>  9 40001473  000000303062     De Sândobbe              <named list> hoof… <list> #> 10 01091668  000000678279     Multiservice Beheer en … <named list> hoof… <list> #> # ℹ 505 more rows rotterdam <- kvk_search(naam = "huisartsen", plaats = "Rotterdam") rotterdam #> # A tibble: 199 × 7 #>    kvkNummer vestigingsnummer naam       adres        type  links  vervallenNaam #>    <chr>     <chr>            <chr>      <list>       <chr> <list> <chr>         #>  1 24475068  000009219072     Wijkprakt… <named list> hoof… <list> <NA>          #>  2 81943938  000048204625     Jans Huis… <named list> hoof… <list> <NA>          #>  3 24484189  000016351312     Sanitas H… <named list> neve… <list> <NA>          #>  4 24477358  000010787356     Van Schai… <named list> hoof… <list> <NA>          #>  5 66346339  000034979034     Huisartse… <named list> hoof… <list> <NA>          #>  6 54446538  000024210382     Huisartse… <named list> hoof… <list> <NA>          #>  7 62380281  000031391419     Huisartse… <named list> hoof… <list> <NA>          #>  8 24484189  000036373648     Sanitas H… <named list> hoof… <list> <NA>          #>  9 85464007  000051508060     itj huisa… <named list> hoof… <list> <NA>          #> 10 24476795  000010613765     Baggerman… <named list> hoof… <list> <NA>          #> # what: Retrieve all results from the KvK Search API (up to 1.000 results) — kvk_search
title: Retrieve all results from the KvK Search API (up to 1.000 results) — kvk_search
text: function automatically paginates KvK API collect available results. Due API limitations, retrieves maximum 1.000 records. Available arguments : kvkNummer: Dutch KVK number. Consists 8 digits. rsin: Legal Entities Partnerships Identification Number. vestigingsnummer: Branch number. Unique number consisting 12 digits. naam: name establishment legal entity trades. can : active inactive statutory name, trade name, name. straatnaam huisnummer: combination postal code. huisletter: combination house number. Consists 1 (alphabetic) character. postcode: combination house number. plaats postbusnummer: allowed combination postcode type: Filter type: main branch, branch, /legal entity.  Combine multiple using ‘&’. E.g. :   type=nevenvestiging&type=hoofdvestiging&type=rechtspersoon. inclusiefInactieveRegistraties: Possible values "true" "false". Default value "false".

title: Retrieve all results from the KvK Search API (up to 1.000 results) — kvk_search
Retrieve all results from the KvK Search API (up to 1.000 results) — kvk_search
text: ... Named arguments passed API query (e.g., naam = "Koudum").

title: Retrieve all results from the KvK Search API (up to 1.000 results) — kvk_search
text: tibble containing retrieved results following parameters: kvkNummer: Dutch KVK number. Consists 8 digits. rsin: RSIN also input. vestigingsnummer: Branch number. Unique number consisting 12 digits. naam: name branch legal entity trades. field contains (statutory) name first trade name. searched name statutory first trade name, show trade name used search query. adres:  List content indicates whether correspondence visiting address, containing following information: straatnaam: Street name huisnummer: postal code house number also input. huisletter: postal code house number also input. postcode: postal code house number also input. plaats: Place type: Main branch, branch office, /legal entity. actief: Indicates whether company/establishment/legal entity registered (Yes) deregistered (). vervallenNaam: Contains expired trade name statutory name search result found. links: links shown deregistration occurred 22 May 2010 "active" "false". Otherwise List containing: Link first search result. 2. Link Basisprofiel (based KVK number). 3. Link Vestigingsprofiel (based branch number).

title: Retrieve all results from the KvK Search API (up to 1.000 results) — kvk_search
code: koudum <- kvk_search(plaats = "Koudum") #> Error in kvk_search(plaats = "Koudum"): API key is missing. Set it using `Sys.setenv(KVK_API_KEY='your_key')` koudum #> Error: object 'koudum' not found  rotterdam <- kvk_search(plaats = "Rotterdam") #> Error in kvk_search(plaats = "Rotterdam"): API key is missing. Set it using `Sys.setenv(KVK_API_KEY='your_key')` rotterdam #> Error: object 'rotterdam' not found

what: Set KvK API Key in .Renviron — kvk_set_api_key
title: Set KvK API Key in .Renviron — kvk_set_api_key
text: function sets updates KVK_API_KEY environment variable .Renviron file. key already exists overwrite = FALSE, changes made.

title: Set KvK API Key in .Renviron — kvk_set_api_key
Set KvK API Key in .Renviron — kvk_set_api_key
text: KVK_API_KEY string containing KvK API key stored .Renviron. overwrite logical value indicating whether overwrite existing KVK_API_KEY. Defaults FALSE.

title: Set KvK API Key in .Renviron — kvk_set_api_key
text: Invisibly returns TRUE key added/updated, FALSE change made.

title: Set KvK API Key in .Renviron — kvk_set_api_key
text: function reads .Renviron file, checks KVK_API_KEY entry exists, : key exists overwrite = FALSE, returns message nothing. key exists overwrite = TRUE, replaces existing key. key exist, appends new KVK_API_KEY entry .Renviron. setting key, may need restart R session changes take effect.

title: Set KvK API Key in .Renviron — kvk_set_api_key
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Set the API key if it is not already set set_kvk_api_key("abcd1234")  # Overwrite an existing API key set_kvk_api_key("newkey5678", overwrite = TRUE) } # }
